divs: sighting detailsstanding on the beach near the boat launch on the north side of highland lake i observed from the north a red\orange glowing sphere like object rise from the hills and ascend above the low cloud cover and then begin to travel in straight line across the sky in a ne direction at which point it went behind the clouds not to return from the other side as would be expected\the cloudy area was a minimal region of the sky and stars could be seen clearly in the rest of the sky that was unobstructed\soon after an additional light also ascended from the same area and also showed the same behavior as the first object in an identical pattern and a few minutes later an identical object could be seen south of my location but much farther in the distance possiblt in torrington,this object was not seen leaving from the same area as the first two.these objects appeared as red\orange very bright pulsating lights
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Winchester
There were no other sightings in Winchester on or around July 7th 2013
